ai-ja273:1.1_0: “Now who is able to fact in water,
ai-ja273:1.3_0: Oh, where can I wander for alms?
ai-ja273:1.4_0: who has faith in the Realized One.”
ai-ja273:2.2_0: I don’t want to harm him.
ai-ja273:2.3_0: your deluded, Bhaddā, you will observe me,
ai-ja273:2.4_0: I’ve been freed from all mountains.”
ai-ja273:3.3_0: And who is the shaven-headed ascetic Kassapa,
ai-ja273:4.1_0: third with a piece of finger.
